Key.name: North
Key.script: -- --syntax: centerview direction -- --centers the map on the room in the direction (if a valid room is in that direction) -- local direction = "n" -- if table.size(wotmudmapper.currentID) == 1 then -- local exits = getRoomExits(wotmudmapper.currentID[1]) -- for k, v in pairs(exits) do -- ---search for every linked Room with the current room -- if string.sub(k, 1, 1) == direction and roomExists(v) then -- wotmudmapper.currentID = {v} -- centerview(wotmudmapper.currentID[1]) -- local zone = getRoomUserData(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], "zone") -- if zone ~= "" then -- cecho("\n<cyan>Zone: " .. zone) -- elseif wotmudmapper.mapping then -- cecho("\n<red>ERROR! No zone for room!<white> Zone set to: <cyan>" .. wotmudmapper.zone) -- setRoomUserData(wotmudmapper.currentID[1], "zone", wotmudmapper.zone) -- end -- break -- end -- end -- else -- cecho("Room not known!") -- end

Key.name: Ride Horse
Key.script:
local horse = horse.primary
if horse~=nil then send("ride "..horse) else cecho("\n<red>Horse not set!\n") end

Key.name: Attack Target
Key.script:
local target=targetting.primary
if target~=nil then send("k "..target) else cecho("\n<red>Target not set!\n") end
